channel.title: CVE Feed for Content Staging -- Content Staging
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Content Staging -- Content Staging

item.title: CVE-2021-39356|2024-09-17T03:52:55.230Z -- content%20staging -- content%20staging
item.description: The Content Staging WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to insufficient input validation and escaping via several parameters that are echo'd out via the ~/templates/settings.php file which allowed attackers with administrative user access to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 2.0.1. This affects multi-site installations where unfiltered_html is disabled for administrators, and sites where unfiltered_html is disabled.
